sense.def:
To squeeze something
pomeni z dveh strani trdo pritisniti na nekaj mehkega ali prožnega.

seg.quote: The children were squeezing the packets to find out what was inside.
He gave her hand a squeeze.

sense.def:
To squeeze a liquid or a soft substance
pomeni dobiti tekočino ali mehko snov iz nekega predmeta tako, da nanj pritisnemo.

seg.quote: Squeeze all the water out of the cloth.

sense.def:
To squeeze through or into a small space
pomeni, da se nam posreči priti skozi majhen prostor ali vanj.

seg.quote: The inhabitants have to squeeze into a tiny area of living space.
We all got in the lift but it was a bit of a squeeze.
